description:
Crafting Underdark scatter & how to use the terrain to build encounters in D&D.
↓↓ Additional Inspiration↓↓ 

PLAYLISTS TO WATCH
➢All my Monster Miniatures: https://tinyurl.com/y22ck2cv 
➢All my Terrain for D&D: https://tinyurl.com/yyco9kkr 
➢"The Simple Tabletop Castle": https://tinyurl.com/y4x34ldc 
➢Crafting Guides & Experiments: https://tinyurl.com/y6zxxc2f
          -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
On my website you can find templates for some of the builds, recommended products, and The Hall of Glorious Crafts where exceptionally epic fan-made projects are showcased.
➢My Website: https://bardscraft.wixsite.com/craft
➢Support the Channel on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/bardscraft 
➢Bard's Craft Nerd Chat: https://discord.gg/n5AfW36

I'm set up as an Amazon Affiliate in some regions. Especially to make it easier for new crafters I have linked to products I use and/or recommend. Any purchases through affiliate links grant me a small commission, that is a good way to support the channel at no extra cost. More recommended products on my website.
